channel.title: repos on Quinn
channel.description: Recent content in repos on Quinn

item.title: CentOS修改系统镜像源
item.description: CentOS修改系统镜像源 一.备份当前源 1 mv /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo.backup 二、切换阿里云镜像源 CentOS7 切换源 1 2 3 4 # 进入源所在路径 cd /etc/yum.repos.d/ # 下载阿里云镜像源并保存为源文件 wget -O /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo http://mirrors.aliyun.com/repo/Centos-7.repo CentOS6 切换源 1 2 3 4 # 进入源所在路径 cd /etc/yum.repos.d/ # 下载网易163镜像源并保存为源文件 wget -O /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo http://mirrors.163.com/.help/CentOS6-Base-163.repo
